Summary: Around midnight I was sitting on the balcony of a hotel room. My head was facing the sky. object flew over my head without a sound
divs: Sighting DetailsAround midnight I was sitting on the balcony of a hotel room. My head was facing the sky. object flew over my head and I saw it about five seconds. The object was shaped like a hexagon with rectangular sides and a square base. Cherry was the color of the shell and had two lights on one side who was facing the ground. lights was very small in comparison to the size of the object. lights was rectangular in shape and looked like from old cars. lights were red. object did not emit any sounds, and smells
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ronks
This sighting has never been favorited.
